content.text: How to make a link tree website
A link tree website lets you share all your links on one site.
content.html: A link tree website lets you share all your links on one site.

content.text: It is a landing page where you can display the links to your social networks, blog posts, businesses, projects, and more.
content.html: It is a landing page where you can display the links to your social networks, blog posts, businesses, projects, and more.

content.text: Why create a link tree website
The links website is great to grow your online presence.
content.html: The links website is great to grow your online presence.

content.text: It makes it easy to share links for the places where you have content.
content.html: It makes it easy to share links for the places where you have content.

content.text: In addition, the links website helps people to connect with you in more than one place.
content.html: In addition, the links website helps people to connect with you in more than one place.

content.text: By creating the links website on your own, you have complete control of it.
content.html: By creating the links website on your own, you have complete control of it.

content.text: How the site looks reflect your brand. Design it the way you want to appear.
content.html: How the site looks reflect your brand. Design it the way you want to appear.

content.text: What do I need to know to create my link tree website?
HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are the basic languages to create a website.
content.html: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are the basic languages to create a website.

content.text: It is all you need to make your links site.
content.html: It is all you need to make your links site.

There are two ways to start building a link tree website.

content.text: Building a link tree webpage from scratch
The first thing you need to do is to build a layout, then add content.
content.html: The first thing you need to do is to build a layout, then add content.

content.text: To create a website layout, go to our article on how to create a website: How to Create a Website
content.html: To create a website layout, go to our article on how to create a website: How to Create a Website

content.text: Once you have made the layout. Create the two main sections listed below:
content.html: Once you have made the layout. Create the two main sections listed below:

content.text: 1. Bio section.
content.html: 1. Bio section.

content.text: The bio section is the first thing people see when visiting your link tree website.
content.html: The bio section is the first thing people see when visiting your link tree website.

content.text: It is displayed on top of the link tree website.
content.html: It is displayed on top of the link tree website.

content.text: Keep it short and sweet.
content.html: Keep it short and sweet.

content.text: The bio section can contain your image, name, and your profession.
content.html: The bio section can contain your image, name, and your profession.

content.text: People are more comfortable connecting with you if they know your name and how you look.
content.html: People are more comfortable connecting with you if they know your name and how you look.

content.text: 2. Links section.
content.html: 2. Links section.

content.text: The links section contains all the links you want to share.
content.html: The links section contains all the links you want to share.

content.text: It is displayed under the bio section.
content.html: It is displayed under the bio section.

content.text: Make sure that the links are well structured.
content.html: Make sure that the links are well structured.
